Energy_Transfer.help: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own Hit Points into a punch that deals extreme damage. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Energy_Transfer.shortHelp: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -HP

Conserve_Power.help: You can focus for a moment to conserve your Endurance. After activating this power, you expend less Endurance on all other powers for a while. Recharge: Very Long

messages.attackerHit: Your concentrate and Conserve your Power. Your powers now cost less Endurance for a while.

Temp_Invulnerability.help: When you toggle on this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage. You must be level 41 and have Energy Transfer or Conserve Power before selecting this power. Recharge: Fast
Temp_Invulnerability.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to smashing and lethal damage.

Energy_Torrent.help: Energy Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. You must be level 41 and have Energy Transfer or Conserve Power before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Explosive_Blast.help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. Explosive Blast may knock targets backwards. You must be level 44 and have two other Primal Forces Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Explosive_Blast.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback
